name: llamacpp-react
description: ```sh make setup make install make -f execute.mk server curl --request POST --url http://localhost:8080/completion --header "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"prompt": "Building a website can be done in 10 simple steps:","n_predict": 128}' curl --request POST --url http://localhost:8080/completion --header "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"prompt": "Building a website can be done in 10 simple steps:","n_predict": 128, "stream":true}' ````
